boilerplate.containers.HomePage.startInt: In an video interview, you would be given {readingTimeLimit} secs to read each question. When the countdown timer reaches "0", the system will automatically begin recording your response. And you'll be given a maximum of {answerTimeLimit} minutes per question to complete your response. Please note that there are no re-takes for Video Interviews and it will be a one-time through recording.
Your could try a Practice Interview before taking an actual interview.
Your could try a Practice Interview before taking an actual interview.
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.question: Dans la page suivante, vous aurez {readingTimeLimit} secondes pour lire une question d'entrevue avant que votre enregistrement ne commence automatiquement.
Il y aura {numQuestions} questions à compléter dans cette interview et vous aurez {answerTimeLimit} minutes par question.
Lorsque vous êtes prêt, cliquez sur le bouton "Suivant".
Date limite de soumission: {deadline}
N'est pas applicable
Next
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Record.U: Please keep this page open while we are uploading your videos
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Record.C: Please make sure camera and microphone on your pc work well before starting the test.
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Finish.P: You have finished the practice interview.
You can now start the real interview.
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Error.de: There seems to be some error in the background uploading of your videos.
Please check your Internet Connection and contact to admin@system.com to get new test.
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.Error.Ch: Your camera and microphone seem not to work. Please check!
If you are sure your devices work well. Please also check if you blocked them on your browser.
Please make sure you allow your camera and microphone to work on your browser, follow below instruction image then try again:
